entry.title: 11 Commandments for Small Software Companies
entry.description: Although this blog posting is on the art of bootstrapping, I think it is also a good set of commandments for small software companies.
entry.content: Although this blog posting is on the art of bootstrapping, I think it is also a good set of commandments for small software companies.
